Description.Name: Donegal Broadcasting Company
Description.Details: Colonization drive in Taurian Concordat Counted as one of the most highly vocal and tenacious factions within the [[DM.Factions[faction_TaurianConcordat],Taurian Concordat]], the philosophical group known as the "Far Lookers" advocates for the exploration and colonization of space as the key to humanity's future and salvation. Their portrayal of the Periphery nations as the true inheritors of humanity's potential resonates strongly with Taurian nationalists who embrace the image of the Concordat as humanityâ€™s ultimate beacon of hope.

Description.Name: Donegal Broadcasting Company
Description.Details:
Perhaps it is this longstanding tradition of exploration ideology that has sparked the latest colonization drive within the Concordat. The recent additions of the [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Marknick],Marknick]] system in May and the  [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Spitz],Spitz]] system last week are testaments to the Concordat's expansion efforts.


On the other hand, our in-house political experts question whether the Taurian Concordat simply stumbled upon two undefended valuable planets and seized them, similar to the actions of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] nations during their wars that the people of the Concordat like to decry.



September 3040 Edition of DBC Monthly News Recap: Stay in the Know!
